title: Science Competency Assessment and Pedagogical Improvement Through Maker-Based Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific theories and experimental design methodologies
context.additional_context: Conducting science projects to solve real-life problems through team-based maker activities in a limited technological environment (smartphone-centric)

learning_goals: Students can systematically design and execute scientific problem-solving processes through maker activities.
Students can derive improvements for the maker project process through peer and self-assessment.
Students can create creative outputs applying scientific principles using smartphones and everyday materials in limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
